xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/15609-Aerosmith: You Gotta Move 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tS2nHeVHuBQJV1iopVsuHM7Vldl.jpg Aerosmith's first official live DVD is a slickly produced affair that was originally made for and cablecast on the Arts & Entertainment network. The commercially released version is available in clean and parental advisory editions (for language) and also includes five bonus songs in a separate "extras" section not seen on the television version. By Hal Horowitz Aerosmith: You Gotta Move
